id: Life planner | Notion dashboard | theme girl organisation and productivity
name: Life planner | Notion dashboard | theme girl organisation and productivity
description: All-in-one notion template life planner for girls who are struggling to keep track and organise everything in their daily life, this planner is designed to make life organization effortlessly chic and effective.What's included in the template?Many pages are included in this template such as:Meal Planner: Plan your meals for the week.Journal: Write down your thoughts daily.Skincare Tracker: Track your skincare routine.Workout Page: Log your workouts and progress.Bookshelf: Keep track of the books
features: Meal Planner: Plan your meals for the week.; Journal: Write down your thoughts daily.; Skincare Tracker: Track your skincare routine.; Workout Page: Log your workouts and progress.; Bookshelf: Keep track of the books you read.; Habits Tracker: Monitor your daily habits.; To-Do List Display: Organize your tasks efficiently.; Study Page: Plan and track your study sessions.; Languages: Track your language learning progress.; Others: Wishlist, Dream Board, Affirmations, and Routines.
